results.name: Number of prime factors of 4^n + 1 (counted with multiplicity).
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..531
S. S. Wagstaff, Jr., The Cunningham Project
formula: a(n) = Omega(4^n + 1) = A001222(A052539(n)). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jan 28 2014
maple: with(numtheory); A057940:=n->bigomega(4^n + 1); seq(A057940(n), n=1..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jan 28 2014
results.author: _Patrick De Geest_, Oct 15 2000
